content: Is there a way to see whether someone is subscribed to a stream, other than tagging them from that stream? It looks like the "Users" sidebar is for the whole organization
on the right side of the popup window, at the bottom there's a list of the people subscribed to it

this is available 1) through the top-down chevron at the right of a stream when hovering, in the streams list on the left. the chevron will show a menu from which you can get to the settings window 2) through the dented gear at the right of the "streams" title, then click on the stream you want
@Kyle Strand yes but when you viewing a certain stream on the website or the desktop app, the users who don't belong to that stream are greyed out from the users' list on the right hand side
